modName: Mystic Elven Armor HD - Balance N Sorting
summary:
Renames the Mystic Elven arrow for Better Sorting & changes craft amount of arrows to 150 instead of 600.

Is based off of Sharlikran\'s compatibility patch, so it\'s CTD free!
descriptionHtml:
Disclaimer: THIS REQUIRES MYSTIC ELVEN ARMOR by SADER325! This is merely a patch, not the actual mod itself.

===========================================================================

This patch does three things.

1.) Renames the Mystic Elven Arrow to Arrow - Mystic Elven to comply with Headbomb\'s Better Sorting Mod.

2.) Changes the amount of Mystic Elven Arrows crafted from 600 to 150, for the sake of balance.

3.) Brings you up to speed with Sharlikran\'s compatibility fixes.

===========================================================================

Installation: Simply overwrite your existing mystic.esp with this one. 

Note: This is version based off v1.5.5. of Mystic Elven Armor. The .esp however is v0.20 of Sharlikran\'s compatibility patch. Be sure to install M.E.A. then overwrite with one of my patches to get my tweaks AND proper compatibility with Skyrim. [Old M.E.A. was used before Creation Kit and had potential errors]
author: StealthRedneck
